com.misfit.misfitsdk.device

类 MFFlashDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.misfit.misfitsdk.device.MFDevice
      • com.misfit.misfitsdk.device.MFFlashDevice
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.misfit.misfitsdk.DeviceBehavior

    public class MFFlashDevice
extends MFDevice
    MFDevice for Flash as MFDevice instance is created before model name is known in connect task, MFFlashDevice supports Device type update to FlashLink after connect

      • startSync

        public void startSync(MFSyncParams syncParams,
                      MFOperationResultCallback resultCallback,
                      MFConfigurationCallback configurationCallback,
                      MFDataCallback dataCallback,
                      MFOtaCallback otaListener)
        从类复制的说明: MFDevice
        Start sync data from device
        指定者:
        startSync 在类中 MFDevice
        参数:
        syncParams - basic parameters needed to start sync, refer MFSyncParams
        resultCallback - the callback of sync operation state
        configurationCallback - the callback of get device configuration
        dataCallback - the callback of get sync data
        otaListener - the callback of ota

      • hasFeature

        public boolean hasFeature(com.misfit.misfitsdk.model.SupportedFeature element)
        从类复制的说明: MFDevice
        Judge whether device support feature
        指定者:
        hasFeature 在接口中 com.misfit.misfitsdk.DeviceBehavior
        覆盖:
        hasFeature 在类中 MFDevice
        参数:
        element - the feature to be judged
        返回:
        ture - support current feature, false - not support current feature
